movie.getAllMovie: SELECT M.* , G.GRADE_TITLE , AC.ACTOR_COUNT FROM MOVIE M , GRADE G , ( SELECT MOVIE_ID , COUNT(ACTOR_LIST_ID) ACTOR_COUNT FROM ACTOR_LIST GROUP BY MOVIE_ID ) AC WHERE M.GRADE_ID = G.GRADE_ID AND AC.MOVIE_ID(+) = M.MOVIE_ID
movie.getOneMovieInfoByMovieId: /*범위 주석*/ SELECT M.* , G.GRADE_TITLE FROM MOVIE M , GRADE G WHERE M.GRADE_ID = G.GRADE_ID AND M.MOVIE_ID = ?

director.getDirectorsInfoByMovieId: SELECT DIRECTOR_NAME FROM DIRECTED_MOVIE DM, DIRECTOR D WHERE DM.DIRECTOR_ID = D.DIRECTOR_ID AND DM.MOVIE_ID = ?

actor.getActorsByMovieId: SELECT ACTOR_NAME FROM ACTOR_LIST AL, ACTOR A WHERE AL.ACTOR_ID = A.ACTOR_ID AND AL.MOVIE_ID = ?
actor.insertNewActor: INSERT INTO ACTOR ( ACTOR_ID ,ACTOR_NAME ) VALUES ( ACTOR_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL , ? )

genre.getGenresByMovieId: SELECT GENRE_TITLE FROM GENRE_LIST GL, GENRE G WHERE GL.GENRE_ID = G.GENRE_ID AND GL.MOVIE_ID = ?
